dict.string: Ski backwards from High Camp all the way down to the Extreme Benches during Christmas or President's Day week, after 3:30 pm. Skiers only. If busted, you lose points.
Eat and drink exactly what Blue does for one whole week. (Weekly/Monthly games)
Ski KT22 exactly the same number of times in one day as Blue. Do not compete with him or interfere with his skiing experience.
Buy Debbie Dutton lunch at the Squaw Valley restaurant of her choice.
Successfully score with a SVSC employee currently living in employee housing. Must spend the night in the disease den.
Get altoid hummer from one of the legendary gnomes in the Enchanted Forest.
Ride, fully clothed and with equipment on, from the top of Bailey's into the Hot Tub at High Camp.
Kiss Tim Burt's snowboard boots. He must be wearing the boots and on the mountain. One player per hour.
Kiss Scot Schmidt's ski boots. He must wearing the boots and on the mountain. One player per hour.
Challenge Lee Dobby (Squaw's only monoskier) to a race and beat him. Lee chooses venue. Skiers cannot skate.
Collect an entire outfit from the Cable Car Lobby Lost and Found and wear it all day.
Talking to your mother on a cell phone (without headset), stick line worth 500 or greater.
Obtain a totally ridiculous season pass picture. 3 or more friends must say, "How did they let you do that?" or equivalent.
Make headband or hat out of Priority Mail tape from Olympic Valley Post Office. Get signed by "Postman Larry" and ski with it on for 3 full days.
Make your own sticker out of "I SKI SQUAW" or "ISNOWBOARD SQUAW" stickers and place it on your car for the season.
Get your season pass signed (permanent marker) by Tom Day.
